attributes.action: Lower tutition fees at university’s in the uk.
attributes.additional_details: That it was lowered before and now it has gone up to an unreasonable amount. Which is putting people off going to university’s which of affecting their futures.
attributes.background: Lowering tuition fees for students, to make it more affordable for them. A lot of students are now getting put off joining university’s in the UK because of the ridiculous pricing of the fees. The government should Lower the prices to a reasonable amount. This can affect the students futures.
